rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made for DevTx ticket I0704.

The reason for deleting them is because their function (which is to update the current.step field in the upgradestatus record and to send a message to the upgrade.log) is now being handled by apm.upgrade.wizard.
Change made by Erwin Soriano as follows:
The first statement in panel check.for.mappings has been changed from:
$L.mapping.query="filename=\""+name in $L.dbdict+"\" and dbtype=\""+str(1 in 1 in sql.tables in $L.dbdict)+"\""

This is because of an RTE change that affected the way arrays of structures are referenced. The previous way of referencing (as it was in the statement before this change) was returning a character. With this RTE change, an array was being returned. This change had to be made to get back a character instead of an array because it will be plugged in to a query variable.
In determining whether or not a file is mapped to an RDBMS, the root.record field is checked for a value of -1 instead of the sql.db.type field beingg checked for null.

descript.descript: Modification made for DevTx ticket I0704.

The reason for deleting them is because their function (which is to update the current.step field in the upgradestatus record and to send a message to the upgrade.log) is now being handled by apm.upgrade.wizard.
Change made by Erwin Soriano as follows:
The first statement in panel check.for.mappings has been changed from:
$L.mapping.query="filename=\""+name in $L.dbdict+"\" and dbtype=\""+str(1 in 1 in sql.tables in $L.dbdict)+"\""

This is because of an RTE change that affected the way arrays of structures are referenced. The previous way of referencing (as it was in the statement before this change) was returning a character. With this RTE change, an array was being returned. This change had to be made to get back a character instead of an array because it will be plugged in to a query variable.
In determining whether or not a file is mapped to an RDBMS, the root.record field is checked for a value of -1 instead of the sql.db.type field beingg checked for null.
